description.en: End-to-end tiling for a modern restaurant in Richmond. Commercial-grade anti-slip tiles in the kitchen, decorative encaustic feature tiles in the dining area, waterproofed back-of-house, and heavy-duty epoxy grouting throughout.
description.zh: Richmond现代餐厅端到端铺贴。厨房商用级防滑砖、用餐区装饰花砖、后厨区域防水处理，以及全场重型环氧填缝。
